page.title: 02TRADE-SHOPPING PATTERNS
page.content: TRADE-SHOPPING PATTERNS There are very few shops in our area,and these are :- a fish and chip shop in Brewood,an art studio at Gailey.There is also a post-office at Stretton,which sells groceries as well as stationery. Most people go to Brewood for their daily shopping,but for the larger household appliances they travel to bigger cities like Wolverhampton and Birmingham. Penkridge Market has a wide range of items including poultry and is mostly used by farmers in the area.But it does not provide larger things e.g. cookers,televions and furniture.
